data.title: Jeremy Sisto (Actor)
data.meta_description: Jeremy Sisto is an American actor who came to fame with performances in Clueless (1995), Six Feet Under (2001-2005), and Law & Order (2008-2010).
data.text:
Profession: Actor

Biography: Jeremy Sisto is an American actor who came to fame with performances in Clueless (1995), Six Feet Under (2001-2005), and Law & Order (2008-2010). Besides acting, Sisto has ventured into screenwriting and producing, as with his work on Break Point (2014).

Sisto began acting as a teenager, landing his first film role in Grand Canyon (1991). His early career featured roles in television films and a breakthrough role in Clueless (1995). He explored diverse characters in films like Suicide Kings (1997) and Without Limits (1998). Sisto screen-tested for Titanic (1997) but did not secure the part.

He received critical acclaim for playing Billy Chenowith on HBO's Six Feet Under, which led to other television successes, including Law & Order and Suburgatory (2011-2014). On stage, Sisto earned accolades for his performance in Take Me Out (2004) and Broadway's Festen (2006). He also co-wrote, starred in, and produced Break Point (2014).

More recently, Sisto starred in The Returned (2015) and Ice (2016-2018). He is currently portraying Jubal Valentine in the CBS series FBI. His career has also included a music video appearance in Maroon 5's "Wake Up Call" (2007) and a soundtrack performance for Six Feet Under.

Sisto was married briefly to Marisa Ryan and then to Addie Lane in 2009, with whom he has two children.

Born: October 6, 1974

Birthplace: Grass Valley, California, USA

Age: 49 years old
